formerly [[White Dragon (Chinatown) (Earth-616)|White Dragon]] | CurrentMembers = Various unnamed members | FormerMembers = [[White Dragon (Chinatown) (Earth-616)|White Dragon]] | Allies = [[Triads (Earth-616)|Triads]], Snakeheads{{r|Dark Reign: Mister Negative #3}}, formerly the [[Hood's Gang (Earth-616)|Hood's Gang]] | Enemies = [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]], [[Marc Spector (Earth-616)|Moon Knight]], [[Maggia (Earth-616)|Maggia]], Tiger-Claw Gang, [[Phillip Chang (Earth-616)|Phillip Chang]]
formerly [[Mister Negative (Earth-616)|Mister Negative]] | Origin = Criminal gang, smugglers | PlaceOfFormation = | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = Marv Wolfman; Ross Andru | First = Amazing Spider-Man #184 | Last = | HistoryText = The Dragon Lords emerged from four rival [[Triads (Earth-616)|Chinese gangs]] known as the Dragon Gangs, in [[Chinatown (New York)|Chinatown]], who were united by the [[White Dragon (Chinatown) (Earth-616)|White Dragon]] into one gang to control all crime in Chinatown. Among their criminal activities was a protection racket and it was as a recently established unified gang that they soon had a confrontation with [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]].{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 184}} Decades later, they would join the coalition of Chinese gangs that made up [[Mister Negative (Earth-616)|Mister Negative]]'s Chinatown syndicate after he killed some of the White Dragon's men and then corrupted him to his side via use of his powers.{{r|Dark Reign: Mister Negative Vol 1 1}} | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = The separation between the Dragon Lords and the Snakeheads is quite unclear: [[Yana Li (Earth-616)|Yana Li]] seems to consider them as a same organization, but stating on the different declarations, they seems to be associates.{{r|Dark Reign: Mister Negative Vol 1 1|3}} | Trivia = | Links = }} [[Category:Chinese Organizations]] [[Category:Criminal Organizations]] [[Category:Triads]] [[Category:Slavers]]
